post.description: Use this API to get the cashier page address. After getting the cashier page address, you can redirect the user to the cashier page to make a payment.

applinkUrl.description: The URL for deep linking to mobile apps

schemeUrl.description: The URL for custom URL schemes

resultCode.description:
The result code.

More information:

Maximum length: 64 characters

resultStatus.description:
The result status. Valid values are:  

S: Indicates that the result status is successful. 
F: Indicates that the result status is failed. 
U: Indicates that the result status is unknown.

resultMessage.description:
The result message.

More information:

Maximum length: 256 characters

disputeId.description:
The unique ID assigned by Antom to identify a dispute.

More information:

Maximum length: 64 characters

result.description: The result of the API call.

disputeId.description:
The unique ID assigned by Antom to identify a dispute.

Note: This prameter is returned when the value of resultCode is SUCCESS.

More information:

Maximum length: 64 characters

disputeResolutionTime.description:
The time when you accept the dispute.

Note: This prameter is returned when the value of resultCode is SUCCESS.
